(ROOT
  (SBAR (IN If)
    (S
      (NP (PRP you))
      (VP (VBP happen)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB be)
              (PP (IN at)
                (NP
                  (NP (NNP Whampoa) (NNP Market))
                  (PP (IN for)
                    (NP (NNP China) (NNP Whampoa) (NNP Handmade) (NNPS Noodles))))
                (, ,)))))))))


mark(happen-3, If-1)
nsubj(happen-3, you-2)
root(ROOT-0, happen-3)
aux(be-5, to-4)
xcomp(happen-3, be-5)
prep(be-5, at-6)
nn(Market-8, Whampoa-7)
pobj(at-6, Market-8)
prep(Market-8, for-9)
nn(Noodles-13, China-10)
nn(Noodles-13, Whampoa-11)
nn(Noodles-13, Handmade-12)
pobj(for-9, Noodles-13)


(ROOT
  (S (RB then)
    (VP (VB make)
      (ADJP (JJ sure)
        (SBAR
          (S
            (NP (PRP you))
            (VP (VBP try)
              (NP
                (NP (DT the) (NNP Orange) (NNP Peel)
                  (CC and)
                  (NNP Sour) (NNP Plum) (NN Drink))
                (PP (IN from)
                  (NP
                    (NP (DT the) (NN drink) (NN stall))
                    (ADVP (JJ next)
                      (PP (TO to)
                        (NP (PRP it))))))))))))
    (. .)))


advmod(make-2, then-1)
root(ROOT-0, make-2)
acomp(make-2, sure-3)
nsubj(try-5, you-4)
ccomp(sure-3, try-5)
det(Peel-8, the-6)
nn(Peel-8, Orange-7)
dobj(try-5, Peel-8)
cc(Peel-8, and-9)
nn(Drink-12, Sour-10)
nn(Drink-12, Plum-11)
conj(Peel-8, Drink-12)
prep(Peel-8, from-13)
det(stall-16, the-14)
nn(stall-16, drink-15)
pobj(from-13, stall-16)
advmod(stall-16, next-17)
prep(next-17, to-18)
pobj(to-18, it-19)


(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (DT The) (NN owner))
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (NP (PDT quite) (DT a) (NN character))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP (PRP he))
      (VP (VBD came)
        (PRT (RP up))
        (PP (IN with)
          (NP
            (NP (DT this)
              (ADJP (RB very) (JJ nice))
              (NN combination))
            (VP (VBG using)
              (NP
                (NP (JJ Taiwanese) (JJ orange) (NN peel))
                (CC and)
                (NP (JJ sour) (NNS plums))))))))
    (. .)))


det(owner-2, The-1)
nsubj(character-6, owner-2)
cop(character-6, is-3)
predet(character-6, quite-4)
det(character-6, a-5)
root(ROOT-0, character-6)
cc(character-6, and-7)
nsubj(came-9, he-8)
conj(character-6, came-9)
prt(came-9, up-10)
prep(came-9, with-11)
det(combination-15, this-12)
advmod(nice-14, very-13)
amod(combination-15, nice-14)
pobj(with-11, combination-15)
partmod(combination-15, using-16)
amod(peel-19, Taiwanese-17)
amod(peel-19, orange-18)
dobj(using-16, peel-19)
cc(peel-19, and-20)
amod(plums-22, sour-21)
conj(peel-19, plums-22)


(ROOT
  (PP (IN For)
    (NP (NNP $))))


root(ROOT-0, For-1)
pobj(For-1, $-2)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN 1.50))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, 1.50-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP you))
    (VP (VBP get)
      (NP
        (NP (DT a) (NN glass))
        (PP (JJ full) (IN of)
          (NP
            (NP (JJ orange) (NN peel))
            (CC and)
            (NP
              (ADVP (RB also))
              (NP (DT another) (NN cup))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (NN ice))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(get-2, you-1)
root(ROOT-0, get-2)
det(glass-4, a-3)
dobj(get-2, glass-4)
dep(of-6, full-5)
prep(glass-4, of-6)
amod(peel-8, orange-7)
pobj(of-6, peel-8)
cc(peel-8, and-9)
advmod(cup-12, also-10)
det(cup-12, another-11)
conj(peel-8, cup-12)
prep(cup-12, of-13)
pobj(of-13, ice-14)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP You))
    (VP (VBP are)
      (VP (VBN supposed)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB drink)
              (PP (IN from)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT the) (NN middle))
                  (PP (IN of)
                    (NP (DT the) (NN cup)))))
              (ADVP (RB first)))))))
    (, ,)))


nsubjpass(supposed-3, You-1)
auxpass(supposed-3, are-2)
root(ROOT-0, supposed-3)
aux(drink-5, to-4)
xcomp(supposed-3, drink-5)
prep(drink-5, from-6)
det(middle-8, the-7)
pobj(from-6, middle-8)
prep(middle-8, of-9)
det(cup-11, the-10)
pobj(of-9, cup-11)
advmod(drink-5, first-12)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (RB then))
    (VP (VBP add)
      (NP (DT some) (JJR more) (NN ice) (NN water)))
    (, ,)))

root(ROOT-0, add-2)
det(water-6, some-3)
amod(water-6, more-4)
nn(water-6, ice-5)
dobj(add-2, water-6)

    (PP (IN stir)
      (NP (DT the) (NN bottom)))
    (, ,)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (VP
      (VP (VB drink)
        (NP (DT some) (JJR more)))
      (CC and)
      (VP
        (ADVP (RB then))
        (VB add)
        (NP (DT some) (JJR more) (NN ice) (NN water))))
    (. !)))


root(ROOT-0, drink-1)
det(more-3, some-2)
dobj(drink-1, more-3)
cc(drink-1, and-4)

(ROOT
  (S (CC So)
    (NP (PRP you))
    (VP (VBP end)
      (PRT (RP up))
      (S
        (VP (VBG getting)
          (NP
            (NP (CD 3) (NNS cups))
            (PP (IN for)
              (NP (NNP $)))))))))


cc(end-3, So-1)
nsubj(end-3, you-2)
root(ROOT-0, end-3)
prt(end-3, up-4)
xcomp(end-3, getting-5)
num(cups-7, 3-6)
dobj(getting-5, cups-7)
prep(cups-7, for-8)
pobj(for-8, $-9)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (NP (CD 1.50))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (JJ Great) (NN value))
      (CC and)
      (NP (DT the) (NN drink)))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADJP (JJ excellent)
        (PP (IN on)
          (NP (DT a) (JJ hot) (NN day)))))
    (. !)))


amod(value-2, Great-1)
nsubj(excellent-7, value-2)
cc(value-2, and-3)
det(drink-5, the-4)
conj(value-2, drink-5)
cop(excellent-7, is-6)
root(ROOT-0, excellent-7)
prep(excellent-7, on-8)
det(day-11, a-9)
amod(day-11, hot-10)
pobj(on-8, day-11)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Conclusion) (NNP Great))
    (VP (VBP drink)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB go)
            (PP (IN with)
              (NP (PRP$ your) (NNP Ban) (NNP Mian)))
            (PP (IN from)
              (NP (JJ next) (NN door)))))))
    (. !)))


nn(Great-2, Conclusion-1)
nsubj(drink-3, Great-2)
root(ROOT-0, drink-3)
aux(go-5, to-4)
xcomp(drink-3, go-5)
prep(go-5, with-6)
poss(Mian-9, your-7)
nn(Mian-9, Ban-8)
pobj(with-6, Mian-9)
prep(go-5, from-10)
amod(door-12, next-11)
pobj(from-10, door-12)


(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (NNP Bee) (NNP Guan) (NNP Coffeeshop) (NNP Blk))
    (NP
      (NP (CD 91) (NNP Whampoa) (NNP Market)
        (CC and)
        (NNP Food) (NNP Centre) (NNP Stall) (CD 01-23) (NNS 7am))
      (PP (TO to)
        (NP (CD 2pm))))))


nn(Blk-4, Bee-1)
nn(Blk-4, Guan-2)
nn(Blk-4, Coffeeshop-3)
root(ROOT-0, Blk-4)
num(Market-7, 91-5)
nn(Market-7, Whampoa-6)
dep(Blk-4, Market-7)
cc(Market-7, and-8)
nn(7am-13, Food-9)
nn(7am-13, Centre-10)
nn(7am-13, Stall-11)
num(7am-13, 01-23-12)
conj(Market-7, 7am-13)
prep(Market-7, to-14)
pobj(to-14, 2pm-15)
